body: I think this isn't supposed to copy any node attributes. This function is needed only because you can't have virtual constructors in C++, so you need to use it to allocate a "clone" of a node that has appropriate runtime info and memory layout
body_html: I think this isn't supposed to copy any node attributes. This function is needed only because you can't have virtual constructors in C++, so you need to use it to allocate a "clone" of a node that has appropriate runtime info and memory layout
